price: Basi tukamsamehe kwa hayo. Naye kwa hakika anao mkaribisho mkubwa na marejeo mazuri kwetu.
arabic: فَغَفَرۡنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ
footnotes: Na Sisi tukamsamehe kule kufanya haraka ya kutoa hukumu. Na hali yeye ana hadhi na marejeo mazuri kwetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faghafarnā lahu dhālika wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
